summary: This mod allows you to cast a spell at an NPC and morph into them
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][center]Background[/center][size=3]I initially created this mod for another purpose but realized it was not going to be possible. However, I found the effects pretty entertaining, so I thought I would share this INCOMPLETE mod anyway. My hope is that somebody can find it useful for their own mod, or people can have a little fun for a little bit.

[center][size=5]Body Morph[/size]

This mod will add a spell called "Become". Cast it at an NPC to be morphed into them! It works instantly. It will only work if the NPC you choose is the same sex as you. Trust me, you don't want to see what a cross-sex morph looks like.

[b][size=6]CAUTION[/size][/b]
[size=4]Save before you use this spell! You will not be able to turn back into your original self.

[size=5]SKSE
[size=3]This file requires SKSE to work[/size][/size][/size][/center]
[/size][/size]
author: DRain64
